snippet: At least two people were killed and more than 40 were hospitalized after a charter bus careered off a Texas highway, the authorities said.
lead_paragraph: At least two people were killed and more than 40 were hospitalized after a charter bus careered off a Texas highway, the authorities said.

headline.main: Texas: Two Killed on Bus Bound for Casino
headline.print_headline: Texas: Two Killed On Bus Bound For Casino
